thread.title: Don't miss: Florida resident discount to 'La Nouba' at Downtown Disney
thread.title_full: Don't miss: Florida resident discount to 'La Nouba' at Downtown Disney

author: Dewayne Bevil
title: Don't miss: Florida resident discount to 'La Nouba' at Downtown Disney
text:
Don't miss: Florida resident discount to 'La Nouba' at Downtown Disney Cirque du Soleil's 'La Nouba' Dirk Franke 
Cirque du Soleil's 'La Nouba" includes jugglers and other characters such as the Green Bird. 
Cirque du Soleil's 'La Nouba" includes jugglers and other characters such as the Green Bird. (Dirk Franke) By Dewayne Bevil Orlando Sentinel contact the reporter La Nouba tickets discounted for Floridians 
WHAT: Florida residents can land discounts to "La Nouba," the Cirque du Soleil show unique to Downtown Disney. The production includes creative acrobatics, unique choreography and other flashy acts. Tickets must be picked up at the theater's will-call window, where proof of Florida residency must be shown. 
WHEN: Tuesdays-Saturdays through Dec. 18. 
WHERE: Downtown Disney, off Interstate 4, southwest of Orlando Caption Cirque du Soleil 'La Nouba' CIRQUE DU SOLEIL
